titles.title: Homeowners' Benefit Protection Act of 1998
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide an inflation adjustment of the dollar limitation on the exclusion of gain on the sale of a principal residence.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 5/22/1998--Introduced. Homeowners' Benefit Protection Act of 1998 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide for an annual inflation adjustment on the exclusion of the gain on the sale of a principal residence.
